snippet.title: Lawmage Academy - Steam Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Lawmage Academy is a magic school RPG where you learn spells, craft potions, make friends, and go on exciting adventures as you uncover the dark secrets of Lawmage Academy.

WISHLIST on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1377710/Lawmage_Academy/?beta=0
